name: Riverside Drifting
description:
Proof of Concept presently due to busy schedule outside.

As Onozuka Komachi, try to slack during your job while using your abilities to manipulate distances between objects and evading your boss the Yama.

Hold [LMB] to tether to rocks (and your boss, though she'll be quite miffed about it). You can keep [LMB] held to tether onto multiple obstacles, which can open new strategies.

[S] to pull to tethered obstacles. [W] to push away from tethered obstacles.

Release [LMB] to let go of tether from all obstacles tethered to.

Try to nap for as long as possible by not colliding into rocks or, worse yet, your boss.

More to come, possibly.
